amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to Federal employee performance awards.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 352 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 352 proposed by Senator Roberts. (consideration: CR S1856-1857; text: CR S1856-1857) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to Federal employee performance awards.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 352 proposed by Senator Roberts.
